name: Bloopy (Mythr, lionofaustria)
description:
PS. The web version will need Chrome or another Chromium based browser

The desktop version will run faster too, if you have performance problems 

Keys

WASD - To move around

E - To interact with machines & items

'Cheat sheet'  image below.

You’re Bloopy - a little android left on a desolate planet filled with humans on the ground, ripe for harvest. The task that’s head is to escape the planet, but to achieve that you need some good ideas and energy to keep yourself running. Luckily the local traders are always up to trade some organs and beep and boop to your face while you’re doing some heavy-lifting tasks to save your ‘world’.

Don’t let your dreams be dreams and go towards the limitless space.

If you're having trouble figuring out what's going on, there's a cheat-sheet here to explain most things, not all though.

Made by:

Sven Erik Adamson

Najimi
